Who we are

Leaders in soft commodity services

ECOM operates in more than 35 major producing countries, working with thousands of farmers and local businesses. We employ more than a thousand agronomists and field staff worldwide, running innovative on-the-ground operations and sustainability programmes to help our customers and farming communities worldwide. Our global presence, unparalleled experience and strong, trusted relationships allow us to create a valuable and profitable environment for our suppliers, customers, shareholders and employees.

Growing innovators

We’re here to create sustainable futures

For more than 170 years, ECOM has been helping secure the long-term future of coffee, cocoa and cotton. With our pioneering, creative spirit and unique on-the-ground resources, we help farmers around the world adopt climate-smart growing methods that improve their livelihoods and protect and regenerate nature. Through our transparent, responsible supply chains, we deliver the products and solutions our customers need.

More about us
